name: PocketCasts
0:
”Alexa, open Pocket Casts”
”Alexa, ask Pocket Casts to give me a recommendation”
”Alexa, ask Pocket Casts about the featured podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pocket casts
des:
Pocket Casts lets you listen to all your favorite podcasts from your favorite smart speakers. Once you've linked your Pocket Casts account you'll have access to your entire podcast collection and more. We'll also sync your playback progress so that you can seamlessly go from listening on the bus, to listening at home without missing a beat. When you're tired of the same old podcasts you already have, we can even recommend you new ones to get you back in the groove.

This skill requires you to have the Pocket Casts app with a Pocket Casts account registered. It's not designed to be used without it.
